alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, Hardee, eastern Manatee, northwestern Charlotte, southeastern Polk, DeSoto and Sarasota Counties through 330 PM EST... At 229 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Lake Wales to 9 miles northeast of Wauchula to near Myakka City to 7 miles south of Gulf Gate Estates. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Lake Wales, Sebring, Avon Park, Arcadia, Wauchula, Port Charlotte, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Gulf Gate Estates, Ona, Sarasota Springs, Sebring Regional Airport, Southeast Arcadia, Myakka River State Park, Myakka City, Ridge Wood Heights, Sweetwater, Fort Meade and Crooked Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for south central, central, southwestern and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota; Polk
